snippet: The group known as Anonymous listened in on a call between the bureau, Scotland Yard and other foreign police agencies about their joint investigation of the group and its allies.
abstract: International hackers group known as Anonymous posts a 16-minute recording of a conference call between the Federal Bureau of Investigation, Scotland Yard and other foreign police agencies about a joint investigation of the group and its allies.

byline.contributor: Nicole Perlroth contributed reporting from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: The group known as Anonymous listened in on a call between the bureau, Scotland Yard and other foreign police agencies about their joint investigation of the group and its allies.

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
